    		Classroom Technology Services
    	CSU Chico's Classroom Technology Services offers faculty and students learning environments by providing technology within the classrooms. Our supported classrooms may contain projection systems, touch screen displays, microphones, speakers, and auto tracking cameras. Please see our Supported Locations page for a listing of the items available for use in each classroom.If you would like training on any of the equipment, please call our hotline at  530-898-5475. You can also drop us a note at classroom@csuchico.edu or submit a service request(opens in new window).We currently do not provide equipment checkout. Please refer requests to Meriam Library Technology Lending(opens in new window).Information TechnologyMeriam Library, Room 338www.csuchico.edu/itSupport Our CollegeYou might be looking for...Classroom Technology ServicesStudent Print CenterGraphic DesignMedia ProductionsPhotographyPrint ServicesPresentation and Environmental GraphicsWeb ServicesInformation Technology
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
